column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Service: The host was warm
column2: and one of the servers was at the front with her when we walked in
column4: too. But our waiter.. I don't really know how to describe him. I guess I would say he was polite
column5: and courteous. In the beginning I thought he was nice
column7: I started to feel something was off. The kindness felt fake. He didn't come off as genuinely caring for our experience. Maybe he was having a bad morning and had to put on the 'fake it till you make it' facade
column10: I've had to do on more than one occasion throughout my years in the restaurant industry. But
column11: adding that to my distasteful food.. eh.
